source.879e651a:
fig=plt.figure().add_axes([0,0,1,1])
fig.bar(blood_group,frequency)
fig.set_title('Frequency of Blood Group',fontsize=16)
fig.set_xlabel('blood group',color ='r' ,fontsize=12)
fig.set_ylabel('frequency',color ='b' ,fontsize=12)
source.378d9a00:
fig=plt.figure().add_axes([0,0,1,1])
fig.pie(frequency,labels=blood_group,radius=1, wedgeprops={"linewidth": 1, "edgecolor": "white"})
fig.set_title('Frequency of Blood Group',fontsize=16)

x = [5,7,8,7,2,17,2,9,4,11,12,9,6]
y = [99,86,87,88,111,86,103,87,94,78,77,85,86]
fig=plt.figure().add_axes([0,0,1,1])
fig.scatter(x,y)
fig.set_xlabel('X',color ='r' ,fontsize=12)
fig.set_ylabel('y',color ='b' ,fontsize=12)
plt.show()
